title: Incorporate PROJ.4 Projections library in spatial
description: Having other projections available can be useful for people wanting to achieve different results.  Consider incorporate the Apache licensed PROJ.4 project into the Spatial module: http://www.jhlabs.com/java/maps/proj/

comments.content: The right spot for this is now in Spatial4j.  It's a planned "eventual" feature; heck there's even a branch Ryan worked on.
comments.author: David Smiley
